intro: Tetramolopium ciliatum, commonly known as the silky mallow, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in rocky soils and along stream banks. Tetramolopium ciliatum is also known for its medicinal properties and has been used by indigenous peoples for various healing purposes.
